title: (1 MONTH FREE) Recently Renovated Eastside Apartment! Close to Dtown
posting_body: * By self prorating the rent after the 1 month free deal the monthly price for this unit is $1,674 *
Check out this Modern apartment in the heart of East Austin!
Boasting easy access to I35 and HWY 290 you can be where you need to be in a jiffy!
Hosting a large hangout pool and brand new patio equipment you can stay cool in the hot months and start getting in shape with their brand new gym equipment.

They make it easy to love your apartment with a fully equipped, gourmet kitchen, granite countertops with tile backsplash, brand new appliances, in-home washer & dryer and 9 foot ceilings with open floor plans.
Don't miss out on this great special, call me today to find out more!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
